verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:11
verses.text: Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:12
verses.text: Greet one another with an holy kiss.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:14
verses.text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. Amen.  The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
